          <title>
            <string language="en">Unbalanced force causes changes in movements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unausgeglichene Kraftursachen Änderungen in den 
Bewegungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements non équilibrés de causes de force 
des mouvements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças desequilibradas das causas da força 
nos movimentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti unbalanced di cause della forza nei 
movimenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θιγμένη δύναμη προκαλεί τις αλλαγές στις 
μετακινήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambios desequilibrados de las causas de la 
fuerza en movimientos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that an unbalanced force causes changes in an object's movement. The pushchair and the roundabout move when an unbalanced force acts on them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free moving object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pushchair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">roundabout</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine unausgeglichene 
Kraft Änderungen in der Bewegung einer Nachricht verursacht. 
Der Pushchair und das Karussell bewegen, wenn eine 
unausgeglichene Kraft auf ihnen fungiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'une force non 
équilibrée cause des changements du mouvement d'un objet. La 
poussette et le rond point se déplacent quand une force non 
équilibrée agit sur elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma força 
desequilibrada causa mudanças no movimento de um objeto. O 
pushchair e o roundabout movem-se quando uma força desequilibrada age
nele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che una forza 
unbalanced causa i cambiamenti nel movimento dell'oggetto. Il 
pushchair e la rotonda si muovono quando una forza unbalanced si 
comporta su loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μια θιγμένη δύναμη 
προκαλεί τις αλλαγές στη μετακίνηση ενός αντικειμένου. _ ο 
καροτσάκι και ο διασταύρωση κυκλικής κυκλοφορίας κινούμαι όταν 
ένας θίγω δύναμη ενεργώ αυτός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una fuerza 
desequilibrada causa cambios en el movimiento de un objeto. El 
pushchair y el cruce giratorio se mueven cuando una fuerza 
desequilibrada actúa en ellos.</string>
          </description>
